did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publications from the student organizations at the ILR School and the Empire State Labor College.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of four publications from student organizations at the ILR School and Empire State Labor College.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ILR School Miscellaneous Student Publications #/3075 PUBS. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p:

did.unittitle: Statement of the Student Association of the Labor College

scopecontent.p: "Our Objective Has Not Changed: We Still Want a Labor College," October 1977; 13 pages.
Published by Radical Labor Action, Cornell University; September 4, 1972; 2 copies

did.unittitle: Sports, Inc. by the ILR Sports Management Club
Perspectives: the Cornell Undergraduate Disability Studies Journal, vol. 1, nos. 1 - 4

scopecontent.p: Fall 2016, vol.1 no.1.; Spring 2017, vol. 1 no. 2; Spring 2018, vol. 1 no. 3; Spring 2018, vol. 1 no. 4.
